question: Match the following:
columnA: Classification of organisms was done instinctively
Linnaeus developed a Two Kingdom system
columnB: Not using criteria that were scientific
Those which had red blood and those that did not

answer.Classification of organisms was done ins: Not using criteria that were scientific
answer.Aristotle divided animals into: Those which had red blood and those that did not

question: Match the following:
columnA: Two Kingdom system did not distinguish between
Classification of organisms into plants and animals
columnB: Was easily done and was easy to understand

answer.Classification of organisms into plants: Was easily done and was easy to understand

question: Match the following:
columnA: Two kingdom classification was found inadequate
Need was felt to include characteristics like
Plant and animal kingdoms have been
columnB: A constant under all different systems
Cell structure, nature of wall, mode of nutrition, habitat, methods of reproduction, evolutionary relationships
A large number of organisms did not fall into either category

answer.Two kingdom classification was found ina: A large number of organisms did not fall into either category
answer.Need was felt to include characteristics: Cell structure, nature of wall, mode of nutrition, habitat, methods of reproduction, evolutionary relationships
answer.Plant and animal kingdoms have been: A constant under all different systems
